column4: Any help? Wubi installation got stuck at grub rescue screen after installing package grub-pc package?
uhmm
did you have a working Wubi install, and then install Grub into it yourself?
much better in the long run to use a proper partitioned install by the way of any Desktop Linux distro, be that Ubuntu, or something else
Yes I'd a working wubi installation. Then software updates installed grub-pc along with it
so Grub got updated, and messed up?
yeah i think so
ok why were you doing Wubi?  rather than installing from a Live CD by the way?
my cd writer was not working then :)
i'll look at the bug link that LibertyZero gave
hold on
sebsebseb:okz
ok I understand that, you probably don't quite just yet
wow LibertyZero that bug sucks
any chance to get it working again?
Have you got a Windows CD or DVD?
seems like I will require windows installation CD
Nope
ah
any other work arounds?
right lets go pm,  since I will go a bit off topic,  and then if I can't help, you can ask here again
